instructionforuse: Serve with rice & garnish with coriander & yoghurt How to cook: Prep Your Protein: Heat a teaspoon of oil in a saucepan. Brown your protein (e.g. chicken, meat or paneer). Unleash the aromas: Add the sauce kit into the same saucepan. Cook gently for 2-3 minutes, stirring to prevent burning. Release the fragrant flavours. Build the base: Fill the empty sauce pot (300ml) with water and add it to the saucepan. Simmer to perfection: Cover and simmer for 20-25 minutes, stir occasionally, watch it thicken. Add delicate ingredients like seafood or vegetables during cooking adjusting the time as needed. Enjoy your Tuk Tuk meal. Top tips: Want more sauce, add more water. Want a thicker sauce, cook uncovered. For creamy less spicy twist, add coconut milk.

preparationinstructions: Air Fry - From Frozen : Based on an air-fryer minimum capacity of 4L and a 125g portion. 180°C, 8-10 mins Preheat air-fryer. Remove product from packaging and place in the basket. Ensure product is spread out in a single layer. Shake basket halfway through cooking. Cook until crisp and golden, and do not overcook. Allow to stand for 1 minute before serving. When preparing smaller portions, cooking time may need to be reduced to avoid excessive browning. Cooking Instructions - General : Cook from frozen. Do not eat raw. Do not overcrowd the basket. Equipment must be cleaned after every use. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only. Oven cook - From Frozen : 220°C, 425°F, Fan 200°C, Gas 7, 20-25 mins Remove the required portion and place the chips in a single layer onto a baking tray. Cook in the centre of a preheated oven. Cook until crisp and golden, and do not overcook. Turn the chips halfway through the cooking time. When preparing smaller portions, cooking time may need to be reduced to avoid excessive browning.

product_description: Net Content: 450 Grams, Additives: Free From: Artificial Colours Free From: Artificial Flavours, Ingredients: Beef Rump (85%), Smoked Pickle and Bone Marrow Barbecue Glaze Sachet (11%) [Water, Brown Sugar [White Sugar (contains Sulphites), Cane Molasses], White Sugar (contains Sulphites), Tomato Purée, Beef Bouillon [Beef Stock, Beef Bone Marrow, Onions, Yeast Extract, Carrots, Tomato Purée, Salt], Cider Vinegar, Gherkins, Soy Sauce [Water, Soya Beans, Salt, Spirit Vinegar], Balsamic Vinegar [Wine Vinegar, Concentrated Grape Must, Preservative (Sulphur Dioxide)], Spirit Vinegar, Honey, Cornflour, Worcester Sauce [Water, Black Treacle [Cane Molasses, Invert Sugar Syrup], Spirit Vinegar, Tamarind Concentrate, Salt, Onion Powder, Garlic Powder, White Pepper, Pimento, Ginger, Paprika, Clove Powder], Sea Salt, Garlic Powder, Smoked Water, Salt, Caramelised Sugar Syrup, Cumin Powder, Black Pepper, Chilli Powder], Brown Sugar [White Sugar, Cane Molasses], Smoked Salt, Smoked Paprika, Red Pepper Powder, Garlic Powder, Onion Powder, Salt, Maize Starch, Parsley, Black Pepper, Yeast Extract, Cumin, Chilli Powder, Citric Acid, Coriander, Caramelised Sugar, Thyme, White Sugar, Colour (Paprika Extract), Features: 21 Day Matured. Selected & Sourced. Gluten free. No Artificial Colours, Flavours or Hydrogenated Fat, Cooking Guidelines: Oven cook - From Chilled : 200°C/400°F/fan 180°C/gas 6 Preheat oven. Allow your steak to reach room temperature. Remove all packaging. Remove the sachet from the pack and place aside. Add a teaspoon of oil (5ml) to a frying pan. Set your frying pan on a high heat until it's searing hot. Seal the steak for 2 minutes turning regularly. Transfer the steak from the pan and place onto a preheated tray into the centre of the oven. Cook for Rare: 14 minutes, turning halfway through cooking; Cook for Medium: 18 minutes, turning halfway through cooking; Cook for Well Done: 21 minutes, turning halfway through cooking. Remove the steak from the oven and allow it to rest for à few minutes to reabsorb the rich juices. Once the steak has rested, open the sachet and pour the contents into a microwavable container and heat on medium power for 1 minute 10 seconds, or until bubbling and piping hot. Spoon over the steak before serving. Cooking Instructions - General : Important Remember to wash your hands thoroughly after handling ingredients during cooking. Always follow cooking instructions. Raw/undercooked meat may contain harmful bacteria that may cause food poisoning. Always wash hands, chopping boards and utensils after contact with raw meat. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only. Air Fry - From Chilled : To seal the meat High / 2 mins, Storage: Keep refrigerated. Once opened, keep refrigerated and consume within 24 hours. Do not exceed the use by date. This product has been specially sealed for freshness and tenderness. The meat returns to its natural colour within 2 to 3 minutes of opening. Suitable for freezing. Freeze before date mark shown and consume within 3 months. Defrost thoroughly in a fridge and once defrosted consume within 24 hours. Once defrosted, do not refreeze., Safety Warning: WARNING This product contains raw meat. Extra care has been taken to remove bones, although some may remain., Country of Origin: United Kingdom, Packed In: United Kingdom, Recycling Info: Do Not Recycle: Film, Brand Marketing: Welfare Statement Asda work closely with beef farmers from across the United Kingdom to produce the very highest quality beef for our customers, whilst not compromising on animal welfare or sustainability. All of our beef is sourced from selected farmers that work to some of the highest standards in the world, continually improving animal welfare and working to reduce the environmental impact of our beef production - all this is done to give you a great quality steak, at a great Asda price., Other Information: Red Tractor - Certified Beef, Regulated Product Name: British gluten free beef rump steak in a barbecue rub with a pickled gherkin and beef bone marrow sweet and smoky barbecue glaze sachet, Storage Type: Chilled, Third Party Logo: Red Tractor (Assured Food Standards), Manufacturer Address: Packed for:Asda,Leeds,LS11 5ADTerms and Conditions. Cut selected for succulence & flavour. From Yorkshire bred farms we know & trust. British Pork. No Artificial Colours, Flavours or Hydrogenated Fat, Cooking Guidelines: Shallow Fry - From Chilled : For best results remove from the fridge for up to 20 minutes prior to cooking. Remove all packaging and place the butter and rosemary to one side. High / 2 mins Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a frying pan. Carefully add steaks to pan and cook for 1 minute on each side. Then, reduce heat Medium / 10 mins Cook the steaks for 6-8 minutes, turning occasionally. Add the butter and rosemary to the bottom of the pan and cook for 2 minutes until heated through, basting the steaks as you continue to cook. Not suitable for microwave cooking. Always follow cooking instructions. Raw/undercooked meat may contain harmful bacteria that may cause food poisoning. Always wash hands, chopping boards and utensils after contact with raw meat. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. For tenderness and succulence allow the steaks to rest for 2 minutes before serving. This product has been specially sealed for freshness and tenderness. Suitable for freezing. Freeze before date mark shown and consume within 1 month. Defrost and consume on day of defrost. Once defrosted, do not refreeze., Safety Warning: WARNING This product contains raw meat. Extra care has been taken to remove bones, although some may remain. IMPORTANT Upon opening you may experience a faint odour. This is normal and will quickly disperse. When the meat comes into contact with the air it will quickly take on a brighter appearance. This natural process is known as blooming., Country of Origin: United Kingdom, Packed In: United Kingdom, Recycling Info: Do Not Recycle: Film, Brand Marketing: Welfare Statement Asda work closely with our Yorkshire bred pork farmers to produce the very highest quality pork for our customers, whilst not compromising on animal welfare or sustainability. storage_instructions: Keep refrigerated. Do not exceed the use by date. Store uncooked meat covered and lower in the fridge than cooked meat. Suitable for freezing. Freeze before date mark shown and consume within 1 month. Defrost and consume on day of defrost. Once defrosted, do not refreeze.
preparationinstructions: Air Fry - From Chilled : 200°C / 10 mins Based on an air-fryer minimum capacity of 4l and per pack (400g). Preheat air-fryer. Place product in basket and place in air-fryer. Ensure product is in a single layer. Turn halfway through cooking. Allow to stand for 1 minute. Grill - From Chilled : Medium-high / 14-16 mins Preheat the grill. Place sausages onto a grill pan. Turn occasionally. Shallow Fry - From Chilled : Medium / 15-18 mins Preheat a little oil in a frying pan. Shallow fry the sausages. Turn frequently. Drain well. Oven cook - From Chilled : 200°C / 400°F/ Fan 180°C / Gas 6 / 22-25 mins Place sausages on a baking tray. Cook in the centre of a preheated oven, turning once during cooking. Cooking Instructions - General : For best results do not prick the sausage skins. Remove all packaging. Do not overcrowd the basket. Equipment must be cleaned after every use. Not suitable for microwave cooking. Always follow cooking instructions. Raw/undercooked meat may contain harmful bacteria that may cause food poisoning. Always wash hands, chopping boards and utensils after contact with raw meat. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only.

Vegetarian Society Approved, Cooking Guidelines: Oven cook - From Frozen : Remove outer carton and inner cardboard tray. 55 min Do not remove film and leave metal end clips in place. Pierce the film around the roast at least 6 times with a sharp knife ensuring that the film is fully pierced. Preheat oven and a deep baking/roasting tray to 220°C/Fan 200°C/Gas 7. Cook on the middle oven shelf for 55 minutes. Carefully remove from the oven and stand for 5 mins. Remove outer film and metal end clips, carve and serve. Caution: Product, Film & Clips will be hot. Microwave - From Ambient : Place on absorbent paper. For 1 potato cook on full power for 8-16 minutes (700W), 6-14 minutes (900W). For 4 potatoes cook on full power for 15-23 minutes (700W), 13-21 minutes (900W). Turn halfway through cooking. Leave to stand for 2 minutes. For a crispy skin place in a preheated oven at 200°C/400°F/Fan 180°C/Gas 6 for around 10 minutes. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. product_name: Frozen Medium British Turkey Crown 2kg - 2.39kg Serves 5-7
producthierarchy_level6: ASDA Frozen Medium British Turkey Crown 2kg - 2.39kg Serves 5-7
breadcrumb: home > Frozen Food > Chicken, Meat & Fish > Frozen Roasting Joints & Sides > Roasting Joints > ASDA Frozen Medium British Turkey Crown 2kg - 2.39kg Serves 5-7
product_description: Storage: Keep frozen. If your turkey crown is not fully defrosted before cooking, it may cook unevenly. This means harmful bacteria can survive the cooking process and you will be at risk of food poisoning. Do not defrost your turkey at room temperature. Must be cooked according to the cooking instructions. For star marked freezers. * Up to 1 week ** Up to 1 month *** (-18ºC) Up to 3 months **** (-18ºC) Until best before end date Once defrosted, do not re-freeze., Storage Conditions: Max Temp °C -18, Safety Warning: WARNING Safety first: To avoid danger of suffocation, please keep this bag away from babies and small children. Contains bones. IMPORTANT Do not wash poultry before cooking. To avoid cross contamination always ensure utensils and surfaces are thoroughly cleaned before and after use. Dispose of packaging carefully. Wash hands thoroughly after handling raw poultry and packaging. Upon opening a faint smell is released from the pack. This is normal and will disappear when the meat is exposed to the air., Country of Origin: United Kingdom, Packed In: United Kingdom, Recycling Info: Do Not Recycle: Whole Packaging, Brand Marketing: Welfare statement Asda work in partnership with farmers to produce high quality, farm assured British turkey that has natural succulence and flavour., Other Information: Red Tractor - Certified Standards, Preparation and Usage: Cooking Instructions Defrosting Instructions: Leave the turkey crown in the bag. Defrost thoroughly in a fridge on a deep dish or tray before cooking and use within 48 hours. Defrost in a fridge for 29 hours. Preparation Once Defrosted: Remove all packaging. Ensure body cavity is free from ice crystals. If using stuffing, only stuff the neck cavity. Oven Cook 170°C, 325°F, Fan 160°C, Gas 3 Remove all packaging. Preheat oven. Measure out 500ml of water. Pour a quarter of the water to create a thin layer in the bottom of a deep sided roasting tray. Place the turkey crown in the roasting tray. Gently pour the remaining water over the turkey crown so that there is approximately 1cm of water in the bottom of the roasting tray. Loosely cover the turkey crown with large sized foil. Place in the centre of oven and calculate the cook time referring to the weight label on the front of the bag 20 minutes per kilo plus an extra 70 minutes. Baste the turkey crown with the cooking juices every 30 minutes. Remove the foil 30 minutes before the end of the cooking time, baste and return to the oven to allow the skin to become golden brown. Remove from the oven. To ensure the turkey is fully cooked, insert a skewer into the thickest part of the meat. If the juices run clear, not pink, it is fully cooked through. Cover with foil and allow to rest for 30 to 45 minutes before carving Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only., Regulated Product Name: Frozen, class A bone-in medium turkey crown with prime wing, Storage Type: Frozen, Third Party Logo: Union Flag Red Tractor (Assured Food Standards), Manufacturer Address: Packed for:Asda,Leeds,LS11 5ADTerms and Conditions. instructionforuse: Cooking Instructions Defrosting Instructions: Leave the turkey crown in the bag. Defrost thoroughly in a fridge on a deep dish or tray before cooking and use within 48 hours. Defrost in a fridge for 29 hours. Preparation Once Defrosted: Remove all packaging. Ensure body cavity is free from ice crystals. If using stuffing, only stuff the neck cavity. Oven Cook 170°C, 325°F, Fan 160°C, Gas 3 Remove all packaging. Preheat oven. Measure out 500ml of water. Pour a quarter of the water to create a thin layer in the bottom of a deep sided roasting tray. Place the turkey crown in the roasting tray. Gently pour the remaining water over the turkey crown so that there is approximately 1cm of water in the bottom of the roasting tray. Loosely cover the turkey crown with large sized foil. Place in the centre of oven and calculate the cook time referring to the weight label on the front of the bag 20 minutes per kilo plus an extra 70 minutes. Baste the turkey crown with the cooking juices every 30 minutes. Remove the foil 30 minutes before the end of the cooking time, baste and return to the oven to allow the skin to become golden brown. Remove from the oven. To ensure the turkey is fully cooked, insert a skewer into the thickest part of the meat. If the juices run clear, not pink, it is fully cooked through. Cover with foil and allow to rest for 30 to 45 minutes before carving Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only.

product_description: Net Content: 454 Grams, Additives: Free From: Artificial Flavours Free From: Artificial Colours, Ingredients: Beef (80%), Onions (8%), Water, Fortified Wheat Flour [Wheat Flour, Calcium Carbonate, Iron, Niacin (B3), Thiamin (B1)], Rice Flour, Salt, Yeast Extract, Dextrose, Black Pepper, Black Pepper Extract, Features: Tender prime cuts, with onion and a sprinkle of black pepper. Grill 12 Minutes. No Artificial Colours or Flavours, Cooking Guidelines: Barbecue - From Frozen : Always wait for the flames to die down and the coals to turn white before cooking. Oven cook or grill or shallow fry as suggested above, then transfer immediately onto a barbecue and cook until browned. Turn frequently to give a chargrilled effect. Shallow Fry - From Frozen : 8-10 mins Heat a little oil in a frying pan over a medium heat, place burgers in pan and cook, turning occasionally. Cooking Instructions - General : Remove all packaging. Always follow cooking instructions - Burgers should always be cooked thoroughly until piping hot, the juices run clear and there is no pink meat remaining when cut open. Raw/undercooked meat may contain harmful bacteria that may cause food poisoning. Always wash hands, chopping boards and utensils after contact with raw meat. Not suitable for microwave cooking. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only. Oven cook - From Frozen : 200°C / 400°F / Fan 180°C / Gas 6 / 14-16 mins Place burgers on a baking tray. Cook in the centre of a preheated oven. Grill - From Frozen : Medium / 10-12 mins Preheat grill. Place burgers onto wire rack of a grill pan and cook, turning occasionally. Air Fry - From Frozen : 180°C / 12 mins Based on an air-fryer minimum capacity of 4L and per burger (57g). Preheat Air Fryer. Remove from packaging and place the beef burger in the basket in a single layer and place in air-fryer. Turn halfway through cooking. Allow to stand for 2 minutes. Equipment must be cleaned after every use., Storage: Keep frozen. For star marked freezers. * Up to 1 week ** Up to 1 month *** (-18°C) Up to 3 months **** (-18°C) Until best before date Best before: When stored at -18°C or below, Storage Conditions: Max Temp °C -18, Country of Origin: United Kingdom, Recycling Info: Recycle: Box Recycle with bags at large supermarket - Don't recycle at home: Film, Regulated Product Name: Beef burgers with onion and seasoning, Storage Type: Frozen, Manufacturer Address: Packed for:Asda,Leeds,LS11 5ADTerms and Conditions. Do not refreeze. - Cook product thoroughly. Do not consume raw. Barbecue - From Frozen : - Preheat the BBQ to 240-250 °C. Grill the Beyond Burger for 10 minutes at 240-250 °C and turn halfway. Air Fry - From Frozen : - Preheat the airfryer at 180 °C. Cook the Beyond Burger® at 180 °C for 12 minutes. Shallow Fry - From Frozen : - Heat pan to medium-high heat and add a tablespoon of oil. Cook Beyond Burger® thoroughly, for at least 9 minutes, turning product frequently., Storage: Keep frozen (-18°C). Use within 3 days after thawing and consume on the day the package is opened. features: From our best-selling Slow Roasted and Southern Style Tasty Chicken Bites to new Smoky BBQ and Hot & Spicy we have tasty, bold flavours to tantalise your tastebuds.. Protein-packed, providing you with the energy you need to conquer the day.. Whether you're at work, on the go, or simply relaxing at home in front of the TV, Fridge Raiders are the perfect snack to enjoy anytime, anywhere.. Fridge Raiders make a fantastic addition to lunchboxes. They provide a satisfying source of protein that keeps you fuelled throughout the day, making them ideal for school or work lunches.. For those leading an active lifestyle, Fridge Raiders provide a convenient source of protein allowing you to get the day done.. Available in a range of packs to suit all occasions including grab bags when you are on-the-go, multipacks for lunchboxes and grazing tubs for at home snacking.. Our great tasting snack bites are also now available in meat-free, packing a plant-based, protein punch.

preparationinstructions: Cooking Instructions - General : For best results remove from fridge for up to 20 minutes prior to cooking. Remove all packaging. Not suitable for microwave cooking. Always follow cooking instructions. Raw/undercooked meat may contain harmful bacteria that may cause food poisoning. Always wash hands, chopping boards and utensils after contact with raw meat. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only. Air Fry - From Chilled : Based on an air-fryer minimum capacity of 4L and per 3-4 steaks (300-400g). 200°C, 8 mins Preheat air-fryer for 5 minutes. Place 3 to 4 steaks flat into the air-Fryer and cook. Turn steaks halfway through cooking to obtain even browning. Do not overcrowd the basket. Equipment must be cleaned after every use. Grill - From Chilled : Medium / 18 mins Preheat the grill to a medium heat. Carefully place steaks on a grill rack and cook, turning halfway through. Barbecue - From Chilled : Grill, oven cook or air-fry as suggested then transfer immediately onto a barbecue and cook until browned, turning frequently to give a chargrilled effect. Always wait for the flames to die down and the coals to turn white before cooking. Oven cook - From Chilled : 200°C, 400°F, Fan 180°C, Gas 6, 16 mins Preheat oven. Place on a baking tray in the centre of the oven and cook.

Place the burgers on a baking tray on the middle shelf of the oven and cook, turning halfway through cooking. Ensure spread out in a single layer. Equipment must be cleaned after every use. Cooking Instructions - General : Cook from chilled. Remove all packaging. Not suitable for microwave cooking. Always follow cooking instructions - Burgers should always be cooked thoroughly until piping hot, the juices run clear and there is no remaining pink meat when cut open. producthierarchy_level6: ASDA Tender Medium Beef Roasting Joint (Typically 1.kg)
breadcrumb: home > Meat, Poultry & Fish > Meat & Poultry > Beef > Beef Joints > ASDA Tender Medium Beef Roasting Joint (Typically 1.kg)
product_description: Features: Quality Checked - Selected and Sourced for Quality and Taste. 21 Day Matured. Vacuum packed for freshness, Storage: Keep refrigerated. Once opened, keep refrigerated and consume within 124 hours. Do not exceed the Use By date. This product has been specially sealed for freshness and tenderness. The meat returns to its natural colour within 2 to 3 minutes of opening. Suitable for freezing. Freeze before date mark shown and consume within 3 months. Defrost in the fridge and use within 24 hours. Once defrosted, do not refreeze., Safety Warning: Remove all packaging before defrosting & cooking WARNING This product contains raw meat. Extra care has been taken to remove bones, although some may remain., Country of Origin: United Kingdom, Recycling Info: Do Not Recycle: Whole Packaging, Brand Marketing: Welfare Statement Asda work closely with beef farmers from across the United Kingdom to produce the very highest quality beef, in harmony with the environment and animal welfare. Our farmers are paid a premium for rearing high quality cattle in a sustainable manner. This allows us to offer you great quality beef at great prices. Through our agricultural scheme we work in partnership with our farmers to continually improve the environmental and animal welfare impact of our beef production., Preparation and Usage: For best results remove the joint from the fridge for 2 hours, prior to cooking. Remove all packaging. Preheat oven and baking tray. Wash and roughly cut carrots, celery and onions and place in the centre of a large baking tray. Place the joint on top of the vegetables and season the joint with plenty of salt and black pepper and drizzle with 2 tablespoons (30ml) of vegetable oil or 50g beef dripping. Top with a rosemary sprig (optional) Topside, Toprump & Rump Rare: 23 minutes per 500g plus 23 minutes; Medium: 27 minutes per 500g plus 27 minutes; Well done: 40 minutes per 500g plus 40 minutes. Silverside Rare: 18 minutes per 500g plus 18 minutes; Medium: 30 minutes per 500g plus 30 minutes; Well done: 40 minutes per 500g plus 40 minutes. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only. To Seal the Joint Oven Roast 240°C / 475°F / Fan 220°C / Gas 9 Then Oven Roast 150°C / 300°F / Fan 130°C / Gas 2 Place in oven for 25 minutes. Remove the joint from oven, add 100 ml of water to the tray. Reduce temperature and continue to cook basting joint occasionally during cooking. Remove from oven, cover loosely with foil and rest for at least 30 minutes before carving. This helps the muscles to relax, making carving easier and the meat more tender and juicy. For best results, Icarve thinly and drizzle over juices in roasting tray, or use juices to make a gravy. Always use a sharp knife and carve across the grain of the meat for optimum tenderness Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. Raw/undercooked meat may contain harmful bacteria that may cause food poisoning. Always wash hands, chopping boards and utensils after contact with raw meat., Regulated Product Name: British or Irish Beef joint, Storage Type: Chilled, Third Party Logo: Union Flag, Manufacturer Address: Packed for:Asda,Leeds,LS11 5ADTerms and Conditions. preparationinstructions: Oven cook - From Chilled : Pork joint: To sear the joint 240°C / 475°F / Fan 220°C / Gas 9 / 30 min 190°C / 375°F / Fan 170°C / Gas 5 / 2 hrs Preheat the oven. Place the joint on a chopping board. Rub the rind dry with kitchen paper and cover with 3 teaspoons of salt working it into the cuts. Leave at room temperature for 30 minutes. Rub all the salt off the joint and from between the cuts. Lightly cover the rind with 1/2 teaspoon of salt and cover both the cut surfaces with tin foil. Place in a roasting tin and cook for 30 minutes. Reduce temperature and cook for a further 2 hours. Cooking Instructions - General : For best results cook from chilled. Remove all packaging and put the sauce sachet to one side. Not suitable for microwave cooking. Always follow cooking instructions. Raw/undercooked meat may contain harmful bacteria that may cause food poisoning. Always wash hands, chopping boards and utensils after contact with raw meat. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. For tenderness and succulence, allow the joint to rest for 15 minutes after cooking and remove the string before carving. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only. Hob - From Chilled : Medium for 5 mins Apple sauce: While the joint is resting, place apple sauce sachet in a pan of boiling water and simmer. Carefully decant the sauce into a bowl and serve alongside the hog roast.

product_name: Summer Grill by ASDA 12 Minted Lamb Kebabs 720g
producthierarchy_level6: SUMMER GRILL by ASDA Summer Grill by ASDA 12 Minted Lamb Kebabs 720g
breadcrumb: home > Meat, Poultry & Fish > Meat & Poultry > Lamb > Lamb Steaks, Chops & Mince > SUMMER GRILL by ASDA Summer Grill by ASDA 12 Minted Lamb Kebabs 720g
product_description: Net Content: 720 Grams, Additives: Free From: Artificial Colours Free From: Artificial Flavours, Ingredients: Lamb (78%), Dried Mint (6%), Onions, Water, Rice Flour, Gram Flour, Brown Sugar [Sugar, Cane Molasses], Sugar (contains Sulphites), Sea Salt, Black Pepper, Maize Starch (contains Sulphites), Salt, Preservative (Sodium Metabisulphite), Antioxidant (Ascorbic Acid), Dextrose (contains Sulphites), Features: Tender lamb mince with a fragrant mint seasoning. Gluten free. No Artificial Colours, Flavours or Hydrogenated Fat, Cooking Guidelines: Cooking Instructions - General : For best results remove from the fridge for up to 20 minutes prior to cooking. Not suitable for microwave cooking. Always follow cooking instructions - Kebabs should always be cooked thoroughly until piping hot, the juices run clear and there is no remaining pink meat when cut open. Raw/undercooked meat may contain harmful bacteria that may cause food poisoning. Always wash hands, chopping boards and utensils after contact with raw meat. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only Barbecue - From Chilled : Grill or air-fry as suggested then transfer immediately onto a barbecue and cook until browned, turning frequently to give a chargrilled effect. Always wait for the flames to die down and the coals to turn white before cooking. Air Fry - From Chilled : Based on an air-fryer minimum capacity of 4L and per 1/2 pack (360g). 180°C, 10-12 mins Preheat air-fryer. Remove all packaging and place kebabs in the basket in a single layer and place in air-fryer. Turn halfway through cooking. Allow to stand for 1 minute. Do not overcrowd the basket. Equipment must be cleaned after every use., Storage: Keep refrigerated at -2°C to +4°C. Once opened, keep refrigerated and consume within 24 hours. Do not exceed the use by date. Suitable for freezing. Freeze before date mark shown and consume within 3 months. Defrost in a fridge for 24 hours. Once defrosted, do not refreeze., Storage Conditions: Min Temp °C 2 Max Temp °C 4, Safety Warning: WARNING This product contains raw meat. Extra care has been taken to remove bones, although some may remain., Country of Origin: United Kingdom, Recycling Info: Do Not Recycle: Film, Other Information: Packaged in a protective atmosphere., Regulated Product Name: Gluten free minced and shaped lamb kebabs with a mint seasoning, Storage Type: Chilled, Manufacturer Address: Packed for:Asda,Leeds,LS11 5ADTerms and Conditions. Please ensure bao buns are cooked until piping hot. Do not re-heat once cooked. product_description: Net Content: 168 Grams, Ingredients: Wheat Flour, Chicken (19%), Chicken Broth (17%) (Water, Chicken Bones, Gelling Agent: Agar, Spring Onion, Soy Sauce [Water, Soya Bean, Wheat, Salt], Ginger, Shiitake Mushroom, Salt, Star Anise), Water, Onion, Spring Onion (5%), Shiitake Mushroom, Wood Ear Mushroom, Soya Bean Protein, Soya Bean Oil, Soy Sauce (Water, Soya Bean, Wheat, Salt), Ginger, Sugar, Yeast Extract, Salt, Cornflour, Garlic, Maltodextrin, White Pepper, Chicken Fat, Chicken Powder, Wheat, Turmeric, Features: Eat beautiful. Chicken & spring onion with a hot soupy centre. Steam in bag microwave 2 mins 20 secs. Source of protein. If microwaving, no need to open this bag, Cooking Guidelines: Steam - From Frozen : 1. Place colander/sieve above pan of softly boiling water 2. Place soup' dumplings in the colander/sieve, cover with a lid and steam for 12-14 mins 3. Leave to stand for 1 min Shallow Fry - From Frozen : 1. Preheat pan with 1 tsp of oil on medium heat 2. Add soup' dumplings and cook for 5 mins 3. Carefully add 4 tbsp of cold water, cover with a lid and cook for a further 6 mins 4. Leave to stand for 1 min Cooking Instructions - General : Add your favourite sauces, herbs or toppings. Serve and enjoy! For guidance only, cooking appliances will vary. Please ensure soup'dumplings are cooked until piping hot. Do not reheat once cooked. Microwave - From Frozen : 1. Place sealed bag of soup' dumplings in the microwave. [Please do not open or pierce bag!] 2. Microwave for 2 mins 20 seconds [900W] or 2 mins 30 seconds [750W] 3. Remove tray from bag and pierce the top of the dumplings with a fork or chopstick, leave to stand for 3 mins, Storage: Keep frozen at -18°C. product_description: Net Content: 380 Grams, Additives: Free From: Artificial Flavours Free From: Artificial Colours, Ingredients: Pork Meatballs (84%) [Pork Shoulder (82%), Rice Flour, Water, Gram Flour, Sun-dried Tomatoes, Basil, Tomato Powder, Tomato Paste, Sunflower Oil, Demerara Sugar, Salt, Garlic Purée, Cornflour (contains Sulphites), Black Pepper, Sugar, Preservative (Sodium Metabisulphite), White Pepper, Oregano, Antioxidant (Ascorbic Acid), Herbs, Rapeseed Oil, Garlic], Tomato Pesto Sauce Sachet (16%) [Chopped Tomatoes, Water, Rapeseed Oil, Herbs, Sugar (contains Sulphites), Honey, Piquillo Peppers [Red Bell Peppers, Water, Sugar, Salt], Tomato Paste, Garlic, Sun-dried Tomatoes [Water, Sun-dried Tomatoes, Salt], Lemon Juice, Cheese (Milk), Olive Oil, Paprika, Salt, Cayenne Pepper], Features: With a flavoursome red pesto drizzle. No Artificial Colours, Flavours or Hydrogenated Fat, Cooking Guidelines: Grill - From Chilled : Medium, 14 mins Preheat the grill. Carefully place the kebabs on the grill pan and cover the ends of the skewers with a little foil. Place under the grill and cook for 12 minutes, turning occasionally. Then, remove from grill and drizzle the sauce over the kebabs, returning them to the grill to cook for a further 2 minutes. Cooking Instructions - General : For best results remove from fridge for up to 20 minutes prior to cooking. Remove all packaging and place sachet to one side. Not suitable for microwave cooking. Always follow cooking instructions. Raw/undercooked meat may contain harmful bacteria that may cause food poisoning. Always wash hands, chopping boards and utensils after contact with raw meat. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only. Barbecue - From Chilled : Oven cook, grill or air-fry as suggested, then transfer immediately onto a barbecue and cook until browned, turning frequently to give a chargrilled effect. Always wait for the flames to die down and the coals to turn white before cooking. Oven cook - From Chilled : 200°C / 400ºF / Fan 180°C / Gas 6 / 25 mins Preheat the oven. Place on a baking tray in the centre of the oven and cook for 23 minutes. Remove from oven, add sauce and cook for a further 2 minutes. Air Fry - From Chilled : Based on an air-fryer minimum capacity of 4L and a full pack (380g). 200°C, 10 mins Preheat air-fryer for 5 minutes. Place meatball kebabs in the air-fryer and cook for 9 minutes. Pour sauce over meatballs and return to air-fryer and cook for a further 1 minute. Do not overcrowd the basket. Equipment must be cleaned after every use., Storage: Keep refrigerated. Once opened, keep refrigerated and consume within 24 hours. Do not exceed the use by date. Suitable for freezing. Freeze before date mark shown and consume within 1 month. Defrost and consume on day of defrost. Once defrosted, do not refreeze., Safety Warning: WARNING This product contains raw meat. Extra care has been taken to remove bones, although some may remain. CAUTION This product contains sharp wooden skewers., Country of Origin: United Kingdom, Recycling Info: Do Not Recycle: Film Do Not Recycle: Sachet, Brand Marketing: Welfare Statement At Asda we are proud to work closely with our British pork suppliers to improve the welfare and husbandry of their animals., Other Information: Packaged in a protective atmosphere. Red Tractor - Certified Pork, Regulated Product Name: Pork meatball kebabs seasoned with herbs, spices and sun-dried tomatoes with a tomato pesto sauce sachet., Storage Type: Chilled, Third Party Logo: Red Tractor (Assured Food Standards), Manufacturer Address: Packed for:Asda,Leeds,LS11 5ADTerms and Conditions. preparationinstructions: Barbecue - From Chilled : Oven cook as suggested above, remove the bag, then transfer immediately onto a barbecue and cook until browned, turning frequently to give a chargrilled effect. Cooking Instructions - General : Take extra care when removing from the oven and opening the bag as it will contain hot cooking juices. To ensure the chicken drumsticks are fully cooked, insert a skewer into the thickest part of the meat. If the juices run clear, not pink, it is fully cooked. Not suitable for microwave cooking. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. For tenderness and succulence, allow the chicken drumsticks to rest at room temperature inside the bag for 10 minutes before serving. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only. Oven cook - From Chilled : Fan 180°C, 200°C, 400°F, Gas 6, 35 Mins Preheat oven. Do Not remove any packaging. Pierce the pack where indicated. Place the bagged chicken drumsticks on a baking tray and cook in the centre of the oven. Ensure the portions are evenly spaced out and flat in the bag. Avoid the bag coming into contact with open flame or heating element. To brown your chicken drumsticks: 15 minutes before the end of cooking, remove from the oven and using a pair of scissors, carefully cut the bag along the dotted line and remove panel. Caution: take care when opening the bag as steam may escape. Return to the oven for a further 15 minutes.

Gently squeeze the sachet to separate any clumps prior to cooking. Place sachet onto a microwavable plate. Cook on full power. Remove the sachet and shake gently. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only., Storage: Keep frozen. Sear along the sides of the steak before taking it off the heat to rest for a few minutes to reabsorb the rich juices. Always follow cooking instructions. product_name: Rump Beef Steak with a Peppercorn Butter 240g
producthierarchy_level6: ASDA Rump Beef Steak with a Peppercorn Butter 240g
breadcrumb: home > Meat, Poultry & Fish > Meat & Poultry > Beef > Beef Steaks & Sauces > ASDA Rump Beef Steak with a Peppercorn Butter 240g
product_description: Net Content: 240 Grams, Additives: Free From: Artificial Colours Free From: Artificial Flavours, Ingredients: Beef Rump (94%), Salted Butter [Butter (Milk), Salt], Black Pepper, Green Peppercorns [Green Peppercorns, Water, Salt, Acidity Regulator (Acetic Acid)], Pink Peppercorns, Maize Starch, Garlic Purée, Thyme, Parsley, Features: 21 Day Matured. Selected & Sourced. Gluten free. No Artificial Colours, Flavours or Hydrogenated Fat, Storage: Keep refrigerated. Once opened, keep refrigerated and consume within 24 hours. Do not exceed the use by date. This product has been specially sealed for freshness and tenderness. The meat returns to its natural colour within 2 to 3 minutes of opening. Suitable for freezing. Freeze before date mark shown and consume within 1 month. Defrost thoroughly in a fridge before cooking and use within 24 hours. Once defrosted, do not refreeze., Safety Warning: WARNING This product contains raw meat. Extra care has been taken to remove bones, although some may remain., Country of Origin: United Kingdom, Recycling Info: Do Not Recycle: Film, Brand Marketing: Welfare Statement Asda work closely with beef farmers from across the United Kingdom to produce the very highest quality beef for our customers, whilst not compromising on animal welfare or sustainability. All of our beef is sourced from selected farmers that work to some of the highest standards in the world, continually improving animal welfare and working to reduce the environmental impact of our beef production - all this is done to give you a great quality steak, at a great Asda price., Preparation and Usage: Important Remember to wash your hands thoroughly after handling ingredients during cooking. Cooking Instructions Fry medium heat Allow your steak to reach room temperature for 20 minutes. Remove all packaging, set aside the butter before lightly brushing with oil and seasoning with salt and pepper (optional). Set your frying pan on a high heat until it's searing hot, then reduce it to a medium heat and carefully place the steak in the centre of the pan. Rare: 2 minutes on each side; Medium: 3 minutes on each side; Well Done: 4 minutes 30 seconds on each side. Turn halfway during cooking. Sear along the sides before removing from the pan and allow to rest for a few minutes to reabsorb the rich juices. While the steak is resting, place butter in the pan with the juices from the steak and cook thoroughly. Alternatively, place butter in a microwave container and heat on medium power for 1 minute 10 seconds, or until bubbling and piping hot. Spoon over the steak before serving. Always follow cooking instructions. Raw/undercooked meat may contain harmful bacteria that may cause food poisoning. Always wash hands, chopping boards and utensils after contact with raw meat. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only., Regulated Product Name: British or Irish Beef Rump Steak with a peppercorn butter, Storage Type: Chilled, Manufacturer Address: Packed for:Asda,Leeds,LS11 5ADTerms and Conditions. instructionforuse: Preparation Instructions Step 1 Remove the claws from the body of the lobster by twisting off. Step 2 To remove the meat from the claw, crack with a nutcracker or tap lightly with a hammer. Step 3 Insert a sharp knife in to the back of the head, cut down to the tail to cut in half and reveal the lobster meat. Step 4 Scrape off the red roe if not required. Remove and dispose of the dark stomach sac. Step 5 Use a skewer to remove the meat that is in the legs. How to Prepare Remove from all packaging, place on a plate, cover with cling film. Defrost in a fridge for 12 hours. See illustrations for preparation guidelines.

product_description: Net Content: 1 Kilograms, Features: Quality Checked - Selected and Sourced for Quality and Taste. Reared to high welfare standards in natural light by trusted British farmers. Live better. High in protein, Cooking Guidelines: Cooking Instructions - General : For best results cook from chilled. Remove all packaging. Do not reheat. For tenderness and succulence, cover with foil and allow the chicken to rest for 5 minutes after cooking. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only. Shallow Fry - From Chilled : High, 9-11 Mins Brush the chicken with oil and season with salt and pepper (optional). Preheat your frying pan over a high heat, open out the thigh fillet and carefully place in the dry pan, turning frequently to give an even colour. Multiple - From Chilled : Fry, then oven cook To seal the meat High, 5 mins Then oven cook 200°C, 400°F, Fan 180°C, Gas 6, 25-30 Mins Preheat the oven. Brush the chicken with oil and season with salt and pepper (optional). To seal the meat and lock in the flavour and juices, preheat your frying pan over a high heat and carefully place the chicken in the dry pan for 5 minutes turning halfway through. Transfer to an ovenproof dish and cook in the preheated oven for a further 25-30 minutes, turning halfway through. To ensure the chicken is fully cooked, insert a skewer into the thickest part of the meat. If the juices run clear, not pink, it is fully cooked through. Check product is piping hot before serving., Storage: Keep refrigerated at -2°C to +4°C. Once opened, keep refrigerated and consume within 24 hours. Do not exceed the use by date. Store uncooked meat covered and lower in the fridge than cooked meat. Suitable for freezing. Freeze before date mark shown. Defrost thoroughly in a fridge and consume on day of defrost. Once defrosted, do not refreeze., Storage Conditions: Min Temp °C -2 Max Temp °C 4, Safety Warning: WARNING Extra care has been taken to remove bones, although some may remain. IMPORTANT Do not wash poultry before cooking. To avoid cross contamination always ensure utensils and surfaces are thoroughly cleaned before and after use. Dispose of packaging carefully. Wash hands thoroughly after handling raw poultry and packaging. Upon opening a faint smell is released from the pack. Turn halfway through cooking. Allow to stand for 2 minutes. Do not overcrowd the basket. Equipment must be cleaned after every use. Cooking Instructions - General : Remove all packaging. Not suitable for microwave cooking. Always follow cooking instructions - Burgers should always be cooked thoroughly until piping hot, the juices run clear and there is no pink meat remaining when cut open. Raw/undercooked meat may contain harmful bacteria that may cause food poisoning. Always wash hands, chopping boards and utensils after contact with raw meat. Check product is piping hot before serving. Do not reheat. We have given you these cooking instructions as a guide only. Barbecue - From Frozen : Always wait for the flames to die down and the coals to turn white before cooking. Oven cook or grill or air-fry as suggested above, then transfer immediately onto a barbecue and cook until browned. Turn frequently to give a chargrilled effect.

features: Magnum Mini Double Caramel Almond & Double Gold Caramel Billionaire ice cream sticks – velvety smooth with an almond or biscuit crunch and salted caramel sauce under a cracking chocolate layer. Experience the velvety smooth vanilla ice cream with gooey salted caramel sauce, wrapped in cracking classic chocolate and caramelised almond pieces of Magnum Double Caramel Almond in a mini size. Indulge in the decadent Magnum Double Gold Caramel Billionaire with swirls of biscuit & pecan ice cream and salted caramel sauce, covered in cracking gold caramel chocolate & biscuit pieces. The chocolate used in this ice cream stick is made with cocoa beans certified by the Rainforest Alliance. Magnum Mini Double Caramel Almond Ice Cream is encrusted with almonds, and the Mini Double Gold Caramel Billionaire is topped with biscuit pieces. This pack contains 3 Magnum Mini Double Caramel Almond and 3 Magnum Mini Gold Caramel Billionaire ice cream sticks, to be stored at -18°C
